qas.question: What are the linguistic blocks Catalan lies between?
What kind of linguistic choices does Catalan have?
What type of unique choices does Catalan have?
What is the Catalan to miss somebody?

context: Situated between two large linguistic blocks (<a0_0>Ibero-Romance and Gallo-Romance<a0_0/>), Catalan has many <a1_0>unique<a1_0/> <a2_0>lexical<a2_0/> choices, such as <a3_0>enyorar<a3_0/> "to miss somebody", apaivagar "to calm down somebody", or rebutjar "reject".
